body.name: St. Regis Hotels Down Alternative Pillow - Hotel Pillow - Supportive Hypoallergenic Pillow - King (20" x 36")
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: ST. REGIS EXCLUSIVE - Indulge in the luxury hotel sleep experience at home with the exclusive St. Regis Bedding Collection. Featured in St. Regis Hotels and Resorts worldwide, our famous pillows, blankets, and sheets help you achieve perfect sleep.
HYPOALLERGENIC - Synthetic microloft fill offers the perfect alternative to feather and down for uninterrupted, allergy-free sleep.
LUXURIOUS COMFORT - Plush microloft fill provides the optimal loft for unmatched comfort night after night. The moisture-resistant cotton cover keeps you cool and comfortable all night long.
EXCEPTIONAL SUPPORT - Our Down Alternative Pillow provides optimal support for your head and neck to help you awake refreshed and rejuvenated.
EASY CARE - The St. Regis Hotels Down Alternative Pillow is machine washable for easy care and laundering. King: 20" x 36"
body.description: Experience the exceptional St. Regis sleep experience in your bedroom at home with the St. Regis Down Alternative Pillow. Enjoyed by guests at St. Regis Hotels and Resorts, the signature hypoallergenic pillow provides the perfect alternative to feather and down for uninterrupted, allergy-free sleep every night. Plush microloft fill offers just the right amount of support and comfort for all types of sleepers. Achieve the restful sleep of your dreams with our official St. Regis pillows, bedding, and linens. King: 20" x 36"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The pillows arrived and they are perfect! Firm and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: I looked for about an hour on Amazon for quality down pillows and nothing for the bill, even for ones with pricing same as these pillows. The reviews were very hit or miss. Then I found these pillows. I am familiar with the St Regis hotels as I stay at Four Seasons Resorts and the St Regis is in the same high caliber class as the Four Seasons. I knew their bedding would be top. The pillows arrived and they are perfect! Firm and fluffy, yet still soft to conform around your head and give the perfect amount of support. I've had them for a month now and my sleep has never been better. They are completely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow I've tried so far
reviews.reviewText: I've had this pillow for about 2 months. It's perfect for side sleepers and great for back sleepers. I wished it would have been 10%-15% firmer for better support. It gets pretty flat but so far I didn't have any neck aches and I sleep well on it. It's the best for me after I tried all kind of pillows: shredded memory foam, down alternative, Purple etc. It keeps you cool too so that's nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what ai expected
reviews.reviewText: Just like the pillow from St Regis Punta Mita! Happy:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
reviews.reviewText: First few days were really nice. After only a few days however, these pillows lost their loft. Really disappointing for the price and definitely didn't live up to the hype. The build quality is excellent, but comfort and certainly longevity, not so much. Consider purchasing if you enjoy crepes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The pillow was exactly what I was looking for when it first arrived. It had the right softness and firmness I was looking for that reminded me of the St Regis hotels I’ve stayed at. However, three weeks later and the pillow has flattened. At this price, it’s hard to justify buying a pillow that flattened out on your after several weeks of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got one pillow and liked it so much I ordered 4 more!
